projects.title: Interactive Portfolio Website
projects.description: This isn't just a static resume, but a dynamic web application I designed to showcase my skills in a hands-on manner. I wanted to create an engaging experience where visitors can not only read about my capabilities but interact with them directly. The core of this project is the 'AI Playground,' a suite of custom-built tools designed to demonstrate my ability to develop and integrate cutting-edge AI services into a practical, user-friendly application. The entire site is built with a focus on modern web aesthetics, performance, and a great user experience.

projects.title: Technovation '25 Event Platform
projects.description: As an advisor for the Josephite IT Club, I conceptualized and prototyped a web platform for managing our flagship national event, 'Technovation '25'. The goal was to streamline participant registration, event scheduling, and real-time announcements. I conducted research into the needs of both organizers and participants to design a user-centric interface. The platform was designed to handle a high volume of traffic during peak registration periods and to provide a seamless experience across all devices. This project involved system design, database schema planning, and front-end development.

blogPosts.title: AI's Role in Modern Cybersecurity
blogPosts.content: Exploring the intersection of Artificial Intelligence and Cybersecurity. From advanced threat detection to automated response systems, AI is reshaping how we protect digital assets. It's a field brimming with challenges and opportunities.

blogPosts.title: Creativity in a Developer's Portfolio
blogPosts.content: A portfolio should be more than a list of projects; it should be a reflection of one's creativity and problem-solving skills. This interactive site is my attempt to demonstrate concepts in a hands-on, engaging way.
